review: Kya kamaal ki acting thi! Shah Rukh Khan ne dil jeet liya. Blockbuster hit!
Film ki kahani bahut hi dheemi aur boring thi. Interval ke baad dekhne ka mann nahi kiya.
Ekdum family entertainer. Gaane aur music bahut acche hain. Double thumbs up!
Direction mein koi dum nahi tha. Paisa aur time barbad ho gaya.
Aamir Khan ki sabse behtareen filmon mein se ek. Comedy aur emotions ka perfect mix.
VFX itne kharab the ki poora experience spoil ho gaya. Disappointment.
Hrithik Roshan ne aag laga di! Action sequence lajawab the. Must watch.
Predictable plot aur overacting ka bhandaar. Bas ek baar dekh ke bhul jao.
movie_name: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan

review: Storyline itni strong thi ki aap kursi se hil nahi payenge. Masterpiece.
Lagta hai director ne sirf paise kamane ke liye film banayi hai, dil nahi lagaya.
Ranveer Singh ka performance outstanding hai. Aisi film roz nahi banti.
Second half bahut zyada drag kiya gaya hai. Editing bahut weak thi.
Pure Bollywood magic! Emotional scenes ne rula diya. Ekdum jhakas film!
Background score itna loud tha ki dialogues samajh nahi aa rahe the. Headache.
Ek nayi soch aur naye concept wali film. Bahut dino baad kuch alag dekha.
Isse behtar toh TV serial dekh lete. Film mein koi naya pan nahi hai.
Deepika Padukone ki screen presence lajawab hai. Poori team ne bahut mehnat ki.
Climax bahut hi weak tha. Poori film ki mehnat bekar ho gayi.
Aisa lagta hai ki filmmakers ne audience ko bewakoof samjha hai. Zero content.
Shah Rukh aur Kajol ki chemistry unmatched. Har scene mein pyaar hai. Classic!
